snippet: On news programs and in chat rooms, aviation experts and the less informed tried to explain how a modern jet like Malaysia Airlines Flight 370 could disappear without a trace.
abstract: Absence of facts in disappearance of Malaysia Airlines Flight 370 is spawning widespread speculation about the fate of the aircraft; sheer mystery is fueling discussion among aviation experts and laymen alike, online and on news programs, as they attempt to explain how a modern jet could disappear without a trace; such uncertainty also gives partisans opportunity to dwell on favored themes, including terrorism.

byline.contributor: Edward Wong contributed reporting, and Mia Li contributed research.

lead_paragraph: On news programs and in chat rooms, aviation experts and the less informed tried to explain how a modern jet like Malaysia Airlines Flight 370 could disappear without a trace.

headline.main: Theories Grow Without Facts on Lost Flight
headline.print_headline: Theories Grow Without Facts on Lost Plane
